name: PrepareFieldmap
author: Nipype (interface), Oxford Centre for Functional MRI of the Brain (FMRIB) (tool)
description: PrepareFieldmap, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.fsl, interface: PrepareFieldmap).

inputs.name: Delta te
inputs.description: A float. Echo time difference of the fieldmap sequence in ms. (usually 2.46ms in siemens).

inputs.name: In magnitude
inputs.description: An existing file name. Magnitude difference map, brain extracted.

inputs.name: In phase
inputs.description: An existing file name. Phase difference map, in siemens format range from 0-4096 or 0-8192).

inputs.name: Nocheck
inputs.description: A boolean. Do not perform sanity checks for image size/range/dimensions.

inputs.name: Out fieldmap
inputs.description: A file name. Output name for prepared fieldmap.

output-files.name: Out fieldmap
output-files.description: An existing file name. Output name for prepared fieldmap.
